citances.sentence: The discretion is conferred for the purpose of enabling the Court to do justice between the parties: WAAD v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural Affairs [2002] FCAFC 399 at [7] per Lee, R D Nicholson and Finkelstein JJ. See also: Milne v Minister for Immigration and Citizenship [2010] FCA 987 at [18] to [19] [2010] FCA 987 ; , 119 ALD 504 at 508 per Marshall J. But " little injustice may be occasioned if an appeal were hopeless ": SZHFX v Minister for Immigration and Citizenship [2008] FCA 355 at [19] .
